summary:
This mod adds three new armor enchantments, Flame cloak, Lightning cloak, and frost cloak. 
The enchantments do damage to nearby enemies.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds three new armor enchantments, Flame cloak, Lightning cloak, and frost cloak. The armor pieces are available in Belethor\'s general store in Whiterun.
The enchantments do damage to nearby enemies.

• Can be disenchanted.
• Does not harm friendly NPCs.
• Is not considered dangerous by average NPCs.
• Does not interfere with the casted versions of these spells.
author: Grambo2
